text:
*Message Lab is hiring a Senior Editorial Strategist* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Message Lab is seeking a senior editorial strategist to join its editorial strategy and insights team. This individual will play a broad and critical role in Message Lab’s work to build client content strategies, while supporting the development of an insights-driven content strategy practice area. 

Working with Message Lab’s editorial and operations teams, you’ll develop content, measurement and analytics strategies for clients, and work with them from onboarding and discovery through execution to achieve program excellence. You will play an important role in developing ongoing insights and analysis that come from these efforts, translating those into data-informed testing plans and evolving content strategies.

You’ll act as a capable strategist and researcher, willing and able to dive into new areas and topics—spanning editorial and activation—and help develop Message Lab’s point of view on what matters. You’ll also be a vital liaison between the editorial and strategic activation teams, ensuring that editorial products are properly positioned for audiences, audience journeys, channel growth, and to achieve performance measurement goals. 

You will think critically about what kind of content our clients could benefit from—be it a blog post, video, infographic, podcast, or other audio material—and will work with external vendors such as writers, visual and motion graphic designers, and other necessary ML team members to make sure the work is achieving its stated purpose.

This position is remote and reports to the head of strategic activation. 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://airtable.com/shrLCOuaLdt8bwAX5>

<@UP6AGE5NE>

*Shopify is hiring a Senior Content Marketing Manager, Product* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

I'm looking for an experienced content marketer who can own our product-focused content stream. This includes informing prospective merchants about how Shopify products can solve their problems and teaching existing merchants how to get the most value out of the Shopify products they're already using. Bonus if you have experience with the Shopify ecosystem or the world of commerce in general. Shopify is digital by default with core working hours between ~9-2pm PST (so ideally N.A. candidates). 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/Shopify/743999737717986-senior-content-marketing-manager-product>

<@UJDL165QC>

*Postclick (formerly Instapage) is hiring a Content and Search Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

If you love content and SEO, this is a really cool opportunity to own organic traffic for a growing SaaS company. You'll also get to run a content refresh project and be the editor for future content.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/26175-content-and-search-marketing-manager-postclick>

<@U015LPFBS0J>

*Postclick (formerly Instapage) is hiring a Content and Community Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Be the feet on the ground for the Postclick content team. You'll run social, but also be part of communities where Postclick customers/prospects hang out. You'll look for participate in these communities, look for new/interesting content ideas and come up with promotion strategies.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/26174-content-and-community-marketing-manager-postclick>
